Class CommonQueryLanguage

java.lang.Object
  es.gva.cit.catalog.languages.AbstractGeneralLanguage
      es.gva.cit.catalog.languages.CommonQueryLanguage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILanguages
public class CommonQueryLanguage
extends AbstractGeneralLanguage

This class is used to create a Common Query Language query. See the specification for more information.

Author:
Jorge Piera Llodra (piera_jor@gva.es)
See Also:
http://www.loc.gov/z3950/agency/zing/cql/
